item.title: How to deploy github pages with hugo
item.description: Install hugo Hugo would be installed easily to windows and linux Repo Releases Windows Extra “hugo_extended_0.74.3_Windows-64bit.zip” Put “hugo.exe” to MSYS64 “msys64/usr/bin” which path had been added to $PATH 1 2 $ hugo version Hugo Static Site Generator v0.74.3/extended windows/amd64 BuildDate: unknown Linux 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 mkdir $HOME/src cd $HOME/src git clone https://github.
